channel.title: How do i put server on serverstatus?
channel.description: I fiannaly got my server working(yay after 2 months of posting help me topics) but now it sais it's offline when I try to put it on serverstatus, can anyone tell me what to do??

item.title: How do i put server on serverstatus?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

dude thats same thing thats happening 2 me , my server is said its offline on server status but its always online and btw how do i add my server on rune-server cuz it says somefin bout im not alloud 2 do somefin or wtva

Read full topic
